pr_title: SAK-43303 Lessons: On Settings, Ownership list should appear ordered …

timeline.message: SAK-43303 Lessons: On Settings, Ownership list should appear ordered and similar as Assignments

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to get all members here? Why not a userDirectoryService.getUsers call with only the few users that can update (siteUsersCanUpdate)?
timeline.author: ottenhoff

replies.bodyText: Hey @ottenhoff, looks like that list is built with all the site members except the ones that have editing permissions.
replies.author: mpellicer

replies.bodyText: This piece of code has been changed because the list of users should be ordered by name.
replies.author: mpellicer
